title: What Are You Waiting For? Tour Today! 📢
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 982 Sq.
Nestled in trees with a nature path, you will find Port Orchard's hidden treasure - The Sidney! 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartment homes with energy efficient upgrades.
Each of our homes come complete with stainless steel appliances, Full size washer and dryer, upgraded lighting, walk in closets, open spacious floor plan, breakfast bar and deck/patio.
Our community offers a Resident Retreat complete with a full kitchen and large HDTV, a Cardio & Weight training center, an Internet Cafe, BBQ Area as well as a fabulous playground!
Stop by today and live the life you want!
The Sidney is big city living in a small country setting.
Full-Size Washer/Dryer, Additional Storage, Carpeting, Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Large Closets, Stainless Appliances, Patio/Balcony
Fitness Center, On-Site Management, Playground, Business Center, Package Receiving, Resident Retreat, Clubhouse, Covered Parking Available, On-Site Maintenance
One-time $600 non-refundable pet fee & additional $100 for 2nd pet.
Pet rent is $25 a month and $45 monthly for two.
